attributes.action: Label the cruelty element in food and other products containing palm oil.
attributes.additional_details: We ask that the UK makes it compulsory for companies to clearly label this cruelty element in products containing palm oil. Ingredient lists should contain a distinct red "C" followed by "contains palm oil" in brackets to enable people to make informed purchasing choices.
attributes.background: Many products contain palm oil that has been obtained at considerable expense to Orangutans and other animals; the environment and ultimately the quality and sustainability of all life on earth.
